name: Samsung Galaxy J3 Pro (Gold, 16 GB)
content:
Buy this phone only when you are giving it to some old members of your family as the phone will get too slugish for the younger generation
Pros- Good battery life

Cons-
1. Poor display clarity even after being a super amoled
2. Not a metal build phone the images are just fake to fool you
3. Slow and sluggish processor
4. Poor build
5. No brightness sensor
6. No compass sensor
7. Still on android lollipop 5.1.1 and no details about future upgrade
8. Poor camera quality READ MORE

name: Samsung Galaxy J3 Pro (Gold, 16 GB)
content:
Full Review:
Ordered on 29th of May Got Delivery By 30th May One Day Delivery This is the Most Admirable Thing in Flikpkart and I Should Say Thank You!! I Bought This Mobile For My Sister She's Not a Techie Or Gamer But She Need a Mobile With Decent Specs With Brand Value Like Samsung So I Decided To Go For It!!
Writing Review After Using 15 Days

Box Contents:
Handset
Adapter 0.5V to 1A
USB Cable
Earphones
NFC Sticker
Some Papers (Manuals)

PROS:
Camera 8+5
Quad-core Processor
Amoled Display
Battery 2600 MAH
2 GB RAM (1.8 GB Free)
16 ROM(12.5GB Free)
Price

CONS:
Displays Isn't That Much Sharp as 720p Amoled Its Bit Dull and In Some Angle Black Shadow Visible Even Though It Has 291 PPI.
There's No Marshmallow It's Running on Lollipop Only.
Rear & Selfie Both Cameras Clarity Isn't Great!
No Front Flash
No Snapdragon Chipset
Conclusion: If You Looking For a Mobile Under 8K With Limited Specs and With Brand Value Simply Go For It You'll Never Regret!!!

IF YOU FOUND THIS REVIEW USEFULL DON'T HIT LIKE READ MORE

name: Samsung Galaxy J3 Pro (Gold, 16 GB)
content:
Display: 5-inch HD 720p Super AMOLED, 293ppi

Design: Faux metal back, plastic frame, scratch-resistant

Size: 8mm thick, 139g weight

CPU: Snapdragon 410 64-bit Quad-core 1.2GHz processor

GPU: Adreno 306 graphics

RAM: 2GB

Memory: 16GB internal storage + 64GB microSD card

Camera: 8MP main camera, LED flash, FHD 1080p video

Selfie: 5MP front-facing, HD video

Connectivity: 4G LTE, dual-SIM, WiFi n, GPS,

Bluetooth 4.0, NFC

Port: microUSB 2.0, USB OTG

Audio: back-firing mono speaker, standard

Battery: 2600mAh, removable

OS: Android 5.1 Lollipop,
